assertNodeExists

Assert that a node exists for the given path and node type.
Parameters:
path - node path
primaryNodeTypeName - primary node type name

assertNodeExists

void assertNodeExists(String path, Map properties)
Assert that a node exists for the given path and property map.
Parameters:
path - node path
properties - map of property names and values to verify for the node

assertNodeExists

void assertNodeExists(String path, String primaryNodeTypeName, Map properties)
Assert that a node exists for the given path, node type, and property map.
Parameters:
path - node path
primaryNodeTypeName - primary node type name
properties - map of property names and values to verify for the node

assertPageExists

void assertPageExists(String path, Map properties)
Assert that a page exists for the given path and contains the given properties.
Parameters:
path - page path
properties - map of property names and values to verify for the page

cleanupSpec

def cleanupSpec()
Remove all non-system nodes to cleanup any test data and logout of the JCR session.

removeAllNodes

void removeAllNodes()
Remove all non-system nodes to cleanup any test data. This method would typically be called from a test fixture method to cleanup content before the entire specification has been executed.

setupSpec

def setupSpec()
Create an administrative JCR session.
